attributes.action: Playing loud music without using ear microphones from mobile phones in public transport and buildings are noise pollultion and should be banned
attributes.additional_details: Playing loud music without using ear microphones from mobile phones, etc in public transport and buildings where the public have access are noise pollution and should be banned; like smoking is banned for smoke pollution. We do not want to hear loud unsavoury, distressing, unsociable, inconsiderate noise (often bad music) on the buses, trains or public buildings. Someone’s music is someone else’s poor taste in music and such inconsiderate distressing hullabaloo racket should be stopped in enclosed public spaces.
